meaningMnemonic: Everyone from your <radical>clan</radical> puts their <radical>fingers</radical> in the <radical>ground</radical> as a way to <kanji>resist</kanji> their lords. Your clan is made of a bunch of peasants, but you aren't going to work the land for other people anymore. You're going to resist. This is a protest! Your fingers work for no one but yourselves from now on!
readingMnemonic: You're all <kanji>resist</kanji>ing with your fingers in the ground, when the lords appear, angry. "You resist us by hiding your fingers with potatoes in the ground?! You want your fingers to be useless potatoes so badly? We'll chop them up and turn them into <reading>ta</reading>ter (てい) tots!"
